en_title: Secretary for Justice to visit Shanghai

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, will visit Shanghai from tomorrow (November 17) to November 19 and speak at the 9th Lujiazui Law Forum.

Mr Yuen will give opening remarks at the forum under the theme of "Belt and Road and internationalisation of legal service". The event is co-organised by the Shanghai Municipal Bureau of Justice, the Shanghai Bar Association, the Shanghai Notary Association, the Shanghai International Economic and Trade Arbitration Commission, the Hong Kong Bar Association and the Law Society of Hong Kong.

During the visit, he will meet with officials of the Ministry of Justice, the Shanghai Municipal Government and the Shanghai Municipal Bureau of Justice, as well as representatives of the legal and dispute resolution sectors, to enhance mutual co-operation and exchanges.
Mr Yuen will return to Hong Kong in the afternoon on November 19.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師明日（十一月十七日）至十一月十九日訪問上海，並在第九屆陸家嘴法治論壇上致辭。
該論壇以「『一帶一路』和法律服務國際化」為題，袁國強將在會上致開幕辭。該活動由上海市司法局、上海市律師協會、上海市公證協會、上海國際經濟貿易仲裁委員會、香港大律師公會和香港律師會合辦。
在訪問期間，袁國強會與司法部、上海巿政府和上海巿司法局官員，以及法律和爭議解決界代表會面，藉此加強彼此的合作和交流。
袁國強將於十一月十九日下午返港。
